dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront the issue head-on, using strong language to assert their point of view.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground with the other party, working together to find a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks, analyzing ideas before applying them.
Your FarTwin will prioritize hands-on experience and experimentation, learning by doing rather than reading or listening.

dimensions.label: Social Media Usage
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin use social media?

options.description: Your FarTwin will frequently check and post on social media, sharing their thoughts and opinions with others.
Your FarTwin will limit their social media use to occasional posts or notifications, preferring more private interactions.

dimensions.label: Career Goals
dimensions.description: What drives your FarTwin's career aspirations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize job security and financial stability, aiming for a high-paying position with benefits.
Your FarTwin will pursue a career that allows them to express their creativity and innovation, whether in art, design, or other fields.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin view the world?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on local issues and concerns, neglecting global events or perspectives.
Your FarTwin will be aware of global trends and events, valuing diversity and international cooperation.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down problems into smaller, manageable parts, analyzing data and evidence to find a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative thinking, seeking innovative solutions that might not be immediately apparent.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize clarity and efficiency in their writing, using few words to convey a point.
Your FarTwin will use elaborate language and detailed descriptions, aiming to paint a vivid picture with words.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on visual art forms, such as painting or sculpture, to convey their emotions and ideas.
Your FarTwin will use performance art, music, or other forms of expression to bring their creativity to life.
